mapper.select:
select
from actor where 1=1
AND `name` like concat('%', #{searchValue} ,'%') OR real_name like concat('%', #{searchValue} ,'%') OR star like concat('%', #{searchValue} ,'%') OR country like concat('%', #{searchValue} ,'%') OR strong like concat('%', #{searchValue} ,'%')
ORDER BY star DESC
LIMIT #{start},#{size}

select count(1) from actor where 1=1
AND `name` like concat('%', #{searchValue} ,'%') OR star like concat('%', #{searchValue} ,'%') OR real_name like concat('%', #{searchValue} ,'%') OR country like concat('%', #{searchValue} ,'%') OR strong like concat('%', #{searchValue} ,'%')
